level.heading: Right of transfer.
level.text: ยง 26-809 Right of transfer. (a) During the notice period provided for in section 26-802 of this chapter, the tenants, by written consent of the tenants residing in at least sixty percent of the occupied dwelling units within the same assisted rental housing, may transfer the rights established by section 26-805 and section 26-806 of this chapter to a qualified entity. (b) Notice of such transfer shall be provided to the owner and the department in writing within sixty days from receipt of notice from the owner pursuant to section 26-802 of this chapter.
